Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.Subscribers

Interface PlayerSub

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, Serializable, Subscriber
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientModel, ClientTCPHandler
public interface PlayerSub extends Subscriber
A PlayerSub is a class which observes a Player class, in order to receive update from it.

  • Method Details

    • ReceiveUpdateOnPoints

      void ReceiveUpdateOnPoints(String player, int points) throws RemoteException
      Provides update about the points of a certain player
      Parameters:
      player - refers to the player who scored those points
      points - amount of points scored by the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • NotifyChangePersonalCards

      void NotifyChangePersonalCards(String Player, ArrayList<ResourceCard> hand) throws RemoteException
      Provides update about the personal cards of a certain player after a drawing.
      Parameters:
      Player - refers to the player who drew a card
      hand - updated set of personal cards assigned to the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • notifyChoiceObjective

      void notifyChoiceObjective(String player, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard) throws RemoteException
      Provides update about the secret objective card chose by a certain player
      Parameters:
      player - refers to the player who chose his secret objective card
      objectiveCard - refers to the objective card chose by the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • getSub

      String getSub() throws RemoteException
      Provides the nickname associated to the subscriber
      Specified by:
      getSub in interface Subscriber
      Returns:
      the nickname of the player susbscribed to a certain Player class
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • notifyFirstHand

      void notifyFirstHand(ResourceCard resourceCard1, ResourceCard resourceCard2, ResourceCard resourceCard3, StartingCard startingCard, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard1, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard2) throws RemoteException
      Provides the first update sent to a player about his personal cards, his starting card and the two objective cards from which he will have to choose
      Parameters:
      resourceCard1 - refers to the first card in the player's hand
      resourceCard2 - refers to the second card in the player's hand
      resourceCard3 - refers to the third card in the player's hand
      startingCard - refers to the starting card assigned to the player, he will have to choose the side
      objectiveCard1 - refers to the first objective card assigned to the player
      objectiveCard2 - refers to the second objective card assigned to the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • notifyAvailableColors

      void notifyAvailableColors(ArrayList<Color> colors) throws RemoteException
      Provides the available colors from which a certain player can choose.
      Parameters:
      colors - the available colors
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception
